## EntrypointsWebpackPlugin class

Produces `entrypoints.json` artifact with compiled assets broken down by entrypoint and then filetype.

Signature:

```typescript
/** @sealed */
export declare class EntrypointsWebpackPlugin implements EntrypointsPlugin
```

Implements: EntrypointsPlugin

## Example

```
import {EntrypointsWebpackPlugin} from '@roots/entrypoints-webpack-plugin'

const config = {
  plugins: [new EntrypointsWebpackPlugin()]
}
```

| Constructor                                                                                    | Modifiers | Description       |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------- |
| [(constructor)(options)](/api/entrypoints-webpack-plugin/entrypointswebpackplugin/constructor) |           | Class constructor |

## Properties

| Property                                                                            | Modifiers | Type                             | Description                                               |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | -------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| [assets](/api/entrypoints-webpack-plugin/entrypointswebpackplugin/assets)           |           | Entry                            | Collected assets                                          |
| [compilation](/api/entrypoints-webpack-plugin/entrypointswebpackplugin/compilation) |           | Webpack.Compilation              | Webpack compilation instance                              |
| [compiler](/api/entrypoints-webpack-plugin/entrypointswebpackplugin/compiler)       |           | Webpack.Compiler                 | Webpack compiler instance                                 |
| [name](/api/entrypoints-webpack-plugin/entrypointswebpackplugin/name)               |           | string                           | Artifact filename                                         |
| [plugin](/api/entrypoints-webpack-plugin/entrypointswebpackplugin/plugin)           |           | { name: string; stage: number; } | Plugin compiler ident                                     |
| [publicPath](/api/entrypoints-webpack-plugin/entrypointswebpackplugin/publicpath)   |           | string                           | Project publicPath                                        |
| [type](/api/entrypoints-webpack-plugin/entrypointswebpackplugin/type)               |           | 'array' &#124; 'object'          | Entrypoints type.Object type will key files by chunk name |

## Methods

| Method                                                                                                        | Modifiers | Description                                                 |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| [addToManifest({ key, entry, file })](/api/entrypoints-webpack-plugin/entrypointswebpackplugin/addtomanifest) |           | Adds an entry to the manifest                               |
| [apply(compiler)](/api/entrypoints-webpack-plugin/entrypointswebpackplugin/apply)                             |           | Webpack plugin API's <code>apply</code> hook                |
| [getEntrypointFiles(entry)](/api/entrypoints-webpack-plugin/entrypointswebpackplugin/getentrypointfiles)      |           | Get assets from an entrypoint                               |
| [processAssets()](/api/entrypoints-webpack-plugin/entrypointswebpackplugin/processassets)                     |           | Runs through each entrypoint entry and adds to the manifest |
